message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire [Product description] for a price that will surely be mutually beneficial. I believe this product holds immense value for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset. I'm prepared to offer you a price of $1000000 for it. Please let me know your decision.  If you decline, I have another interested party who is willing to purchase it for that price.
